The second best game ever(first is KSP:))

is War thunder, you may have seen its adds, but it is the best game in the orld and it is free.

Search and download, and play today.

its "meh" at best. though for a free to play, its nice though the best game ever (no offence squad and ksp vets) but its Halo 3 (IN MY OPINION) OR Seek and destroy for PS2 ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seek_and_Destroy_(2002_video_game) )

My second favorite game has to be GTA San Andreas. That game had a well written story, and I actually got emotionally attached to CJ. It was the first video game I beat to the end.

Yeah, War Thunder is pretty awesome. I wouldn't call it second best, though.

That title goes to the game that I play when bored with KSP: Vindictus.
War Thunder is excellent, even though my kill/death ratio is embarrassing. I'm no good with fast paced shooters.

#2 game for me is/was Starflight. Nothing will ever come close tbh

http://www.starflt.com/

For me, Civilization II. I played that game obsessively when I was younger, almost as much as I play KSP now.

Crusader Kings II has gotten pretty high on the list, too, in recent months.

FTL: Faster Than Light

YES. I love this game. Probably my favorite game of 2012 even though I sank relatively few hours into it. Such a charming and interesting game.

I've also been playing Homeworld 2 with the Complex mod, Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion, and Civilization 5. On PC, anyway. For consoles I've been playing Halo 4 and Borderlands 2. But mostly, it's been KSP.

I really can't rank my games in order. They're all too fun, and sometimes i get bored with one and move to another.

Although the games i play the most are:

Civ 4

KSP

Don't starve

Gta:SAMP

Battlefield 2
As far as games to come out, The Last Of Us for ps3 looks good.

my 2nd most favorite game is ONI for ps2 or PC (played both)

The game is awesome but harder than triceratopses nutt sack XD
